availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William T. Mathis (Calloway County, KY, farmer and prov govt)

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, resident. Virginia native. Married to Eliza Mathis. Married to Elizabeth Ramsey Mathis. Father of Viola Mathis, Thomas Mathis, Miram Mathis, Paulina Mathis, Elvira Mathis, William Mathis, Artamissa Mathis, and Haraton Mathis. Farmer in Rutherford County, Tennessee in 1850. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.
